Title: Episode #3.8
Writer: Andy Baker (story), Tom Edge, Ed Macdonald (story)
Actors: Yasmine Akram, Bekka Bowling, Jaz Deol, Johnny Flynn
Plot: At their college reunion, Evie and Dylan encounter a ex-boyfriend of Evie's. Luke tries to avoid dealing with his feelings. Angus concocts a plan to look more accomplished to his former college friends.
